T
he  Petitioners  have  failed  to  demonstrate  to  this  Court  the  statutory  duty  of  the  1st
Respondent which he allegedly has failed to perform. The Petitioners have also failed to
be clear in their pleadings and submissions and have failed to clarify the vital question as
to whether there was an annual General meeting held or not. In the absence of clarity on
the most vital question which is the grievance of the Petitioners in our view, the Petitioners'
